msbt.message: Hey! Aren't youdon't tell me, now. You're , aren't you?Well, it's funny running into you. Look around. That's right, kiddo. I moved to !Shame we'll be on different islands, but hey, if you ever feel like jabberin', don't be a stranger!

! I didn't know you visited . It's good to see you, kiddo! I'm livin' it up here! The food's high in fiber, plus I can sleep past dawn and nobody'll bat an eye!Well, I'll let you get back to doing whatever it is you do. If you ever want to shoot the breeze, trot on by!

We've met, right? Oh! You're ! Ha! Sorry, your face got lost in the old brain box.It's me, ! How are you? You still using those whatsits? Apps, or whatever they're called?Actually, I just moved here today, and unpacking's got me too sore for company. Come by later, OK?

You! You're, right? I thought I recognized you! How you been? This is where I hang my cap these days. It's quiet here, friendly, and the ground's real soft in case I trip. Anyway, if you ever make it back, don't be a stranger. Take care now!
